Articles.Content:
Hello^^,

I already played Kerbal Space Program for lots of hours and i really like the game.  Countless rockets and kerbonauts already exploded during the launch.  I was searching for mods to fill gaps which i recognized through my Stock-Playtime or to reduce the partcount by adding BIGGER parts from mods and found some months ago this forum here.

English isn´t my native language and i don´t have much expercience with forums yet.  Can it be a problem when i make some mistakes in writing and how do i start in this forum?  Can i just pick a thread and comment something as long as it suits with the topic?

Hello Hydrogeddon, and welcome to the forum!

Glad you decided to hop aboard our fine community.

You can comment on any thread or start your own threads.  For your first three posts, you will have to wait for a moderator to read and approve them.  After that, all you need to know can be found in the Forum Guidelines, a thread for learning about our new forum software, and the ever important Gameplay Questions and Tutorials section, as well as the KSP Wiki.

Hope this helps.

Happy landings!

Yeah, what Starhawk said.

The only thing I can add is that you might check out the International Subforum.

Welcome aboard!

Quote

Can it be a problem when i make some mistakes in writing 

No.

Quote

Can i just pick a thread and comment something as long as it suits with the topic? 

Yes.

Hello @Hydrogeddon,

Looks like your questions are already addressed, but Welcome to the forums!
